version.title: Version
version.description: service version, where `15.6.1-138` is short for supabase-15.6.1.138

replicas.title: Replicas
replicas.description: The number of replicas, for standalone mode, the replicas is 1, for replication mode, the default replicas is 2.

storage.title: Storage(Gi)
storage.description: Storage size, the unit is Gi.

storageClassName.title: Storage Class Name
storageClassName.description: Storage class name of the data volume
